issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Implement INSTR function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14193](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14193). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Returns the position of the first occurrence of `substr` in `str`. Returns `null` if either of the arguments are `null` and returns `0` if `substr` could not be found in `str`.
